events.message: Customer reported a car collision that occurred at an intersection, requesting immediate claim initiation.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident after verifying the report mentioned a vehicle collision.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to handle the customer's auto accident case efficiently.
Acknowledgement sent to the customer confirming receipt of auto accident claim and next steps.
Requested photos of vehicle damage, police report, and driver's license to proceed with investigation.
Customer submitted all requested documents, including detailed photos and official police report.
Investigation team began assessing the damage report and verifying claim details for accuracy.
Investigation concluded with findings confirming collision and extent of damages as claimed.
A settlement offer has been proposed to cover repair costs in line with policy coverage limits.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and appreciated prompt handling.
Approval granted for the claim following customer's acceptance of the settlement proposal.
Payment for the approved repair amount has been issued directly to the customer's bank account.
The auto accident claim file has been officially closed after successful payment and customer confirmation.
Claim documents and related correspondence archived for record-keeping and future reference.
